name: Sahkil

sources.name: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege

link.name: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege pg. 84
link.alt: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege pg. 84

text: Sahkils are fiends that delight in spreading fear and unease among mortal creatures. They typically have darkvision, immunity to fear, and weakness to good.
